Text:
Good rip, A10V10, Japanese audio track, No hard subtitles, External English subtitles.

BUT, from 1:19:11 There is no sound, which is like 14 minutes until the end of the movie. It's a bit annoying, but the audio is Japanese anyway.
I can confirm that there really is no sound in the end of the movie!
No audio at end. Bad rip everybody.
